content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), and (-14.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-12.5, -49.5) and (-9.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal Storage and Transfer System at Position (47.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors with furnace outputs
- Ensure that furnaces have space in their output inventory to prevent extraction failures.
- Regularly clear furnace outputs to avoid blockages.

### Errors with inserter fuel management
- Keep inserters refueled to maintain continuous operation.
- Monitor inserter fuel levels to prevent interruptions in the production line.

### Errors with mining drills and storage
- Ensure that chests connected to mining drills are regularly emptied to prevent mining stoppages.
- Check warnings on mining drills and address any issues such as full chests or lack of fuel.
